Detailed Description

template<class Mesh>
class IsoEx::MarchingCubesT< Mesh >

This class implements the well known Marching Cubes algorithm.

The 0-level iso-surface is extracted in the constructor. Use it through the convenience function IsoEx::marching_cubes() .
